Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface MutableContext

All Superinterfaces:
Composeable<Context>, Context
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleMutableContext, SimpleMutableResourceLocator
public interface MutableContext extends Context
A context which support setting properties and registering services.
Author:
Pavel

    • map

      default MutableContext map(Function<String,String> mapper)
      Specified by:
      map in interface Context
      Parameters:
      mapper - Key mapping function.
      Returns:
      A context which maps the key using the mapper function in get(String> and get(String,Class) methods. Returns this context if mapper is null. Service registration and unregistration methods are passed to this context without mapping.
